page.title: Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station A1143 (MA073LL/A)

revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Apple |model=A1143 |revision=(MA073LL/A) |upc=718908400050 |ean= |asin=B000MP831G |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/09/2007 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U01H335 |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=BCGA1143 |ic_id=579C-A1143 |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5181 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=M28W128FL |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4H561638H-UCB3 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI,USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Foxconn U01H367 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5416 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5133 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:19:E3 |oui_eth= }} [http://www.vonwentzel.net/ABS/Dissection-Extreme-n/index.html The Airport Extreme, version n, dissected] (noice internal shots)
[http://www.vonwentzel.net/ABS/Evolution/index.html Evolution of the ABS] Manufactured by Foxconn (internal part U01H335 / U01H335T01) [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AirPort AirPort devices on Wikipedia]
[http://www.amazon.com/Apple-MA073LL-AirPort-Extreme-Station/dp/B000MP831G On Amazon.com] (reviews) The device uses three antennas. The MIMO configuration is assumed to be 3x3. The Mini PCI card is part AR5BMB-0072TA (MB72). The FCC photos show the card labeled with a MAC starting with 00:16:CB. A [http://web.archive.org/web/20070217000047/http://www.ifixit.com/Guide/Mac/Airport-Extreme-802-11n/Disassembly-Page-1-Disassembly teardown of the device was previously featured on iFixit] (linked from [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=9389 here]), pictures recovered by archive.org are linked below.. *[http://web.archive.org/web/20070217000219/http://www.ifixit.com/Guide/200/images_large/airport_logic_top.jpg High-res board top] *[http://web.archive.org/web/20070216235926/http://www.ifixit.com/Guide/200/images_large/airport_logic_bottom.jpg High-res board bottom]
